title: Aster layer-1 blockchain testnet goes live, mainnet rollout targeted for Q1

title: Polymarket Taps Circle to Support Dollar-Denominated Settlements
snippet: Stablecoin issuer Circle has launched a partnership with prediction market Polymarket.
